claim: a learning method based on inductive logic programming quickly converges to the correct model with respect to many phonological and morphological differences that are regular in nature
text: The results show that a learning method based on inductive logic programming quickly converges to the correct model with respect to many phonological and morphological differences that are regular in nature .

claim_evidence: a larger parallel corpus in conjunction with this method could potentially improve the results substantiallywith a larger set of data , thresholds could bemorphophonological generalizations are triggeredlexical correspondences could be learned
evidence: We expect that a larger parallel corpus in conjunction with this method could potentially improve the results substantiallywith a larger set of data , thresholds could be set so that morphophonological generalizations are triggered only after a sufficient number of training examples ( avoiding overgeneration and , naturally , many more unique , non-regular , lexical correspondences could be learned .
text: We expect that a larger parallel corpus in conjunction with this method could potentially improve the results substantiallywith a larger set of data , thresholds could be set so that morphophonological generalizations are triggered only after a sufficient number of training examples ( avoiding overgeneration and , naturally , many more unique , non-regular , lexical correspondences could be learned .

claim: The goal is to produce a model that translates individual lexical dialectal items to their standard dialect counterparts in order to facilitate dialectal use of available NLP tools that only assume standard-form input
text: The goal is to produce a model that translates individual lexical dialectal items to their standard dialect counterparts in order to facilitate dialectal use of available NLP tools that only assume standard-form input .
